title: Epic: AI Features Integration
description: PRD: prd-openai-api-provider-v1.md | Requirements: FR-10(P1), FR-11(P2), FR-12(P2), FR-9(P2) | Update all AI generation commands to use new OpenAI client with active profile. title: Update AI generation to use openai client
description: PARENT: jean-tui.feat-llm-integration-3f7 | Replace openrouter.NewClient() calls with openai.NewClient() using active profile. Update generateCommitMessage, generateBranchName, generatePRContent. Priority: P1

title: Implement fallback provider logic
description: PARENT: jean-tui.feat-llm-integration-3f7 | Add fallback logic: if primary API call fails, retry with fallback profile. Show notification when fallback is used. Configurable fallback option. Priority: P2

title: Define provider types and defaults

title: Epic: Testing Strategy
description: PRD: prd-openai-api-provider-v1.md | Comprehensive testing for OpenAI provider system. Unit tests for client, provider types, profile CRUD. Integration tests for AI generation. Mock HTTP server for API testing. Target >80% coverage. Files: openai/client_test.go, openai/provider_test.go, config/config_test.go. Priority: P2 Normal

title: Epic: Provider Profile Configuration System

Remove old OpenRouter config fields. Modify config/config.go. Priority: P1 High

title: Epic: Core OpenAI Client Architecture

Files: openai/client.go, openai/provider.go, openai/models.go, openai/errors.go, openai/prompts.go. Implement Bearer token auth, chat completions endpoint, error handling. Priority: P0 Critical
